ARABIC: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, These are my guests so do not put me to shame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Said Lot: "These are my guests; do not put me to shame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "These are my guests, so do not disgrace me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: rushed towards the house of Lot. Lot said to them, "These are my guests. Do not disgrace me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “These are my guests – do not dishonour me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Lut] said: "Verily, these are my guests, so do not shame me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Surely these are my guests, therefore do not disgrace me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'These are my guests; put me not to shame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Lo! they are my guests. Affront me not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he told them, "These are my guests, so do not disgrace me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: verily these are my guests, so disgace me not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘These are indeed my guests. Do not bring dishonour on me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Lut said: "These are my guests: disgrace me not:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Lout (Lot)] said: "Verily! these are my guests, so shame me not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'These are my guests; do not shame me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “These are my guests, so do not embarrass me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:68] He, Lot, said, ‘Lo! these are my guests, so do not disgrace me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Lot said to them: (Lo! they are my guests. Affront me not!) do not shame me in front of them.
